# Spice Grill & Bar - Full AI Documentation

## Business Overview
Spice Grill & Bar is the premier destination for authentic Punjabi cuisine in Ash Fork, Arizona. Established in 2024, we bring the rich traditions of Punjabi cooking to the historic Route 66. Our chefs use time-honored recipes and over 25 signature spices to create a unique dining experience.

## Core Values
- **Mission**: To serve authentic Punjabi Indian cuisine while providing an exceptional dining experience that celebrates the rich culinary heritage of Punjab.
- **Vision**: To be the premier destination in Ash Fork for Punjabi cuisine, known for our exceptional food, warm hospitality, and inviting atmosphere.
- **Values**: Quality, authenticity, and customer satisfaction are at the heart of everything we do.
- **Certifications**: 100% Halal Certified.

## Location & Contact
- **Address**: 33 Lewis Ave, Ash Fork, AZ 86320
- **Phone**: (928) 277-1292
- **Website**: https://spicegrillbar66.com
- **Order Online**: https://order.toasttab.com/online/spice-grill-bar-33-lewis-ave

## Operating Hours
- **Monday**: Closed
- **Tuesday - Thursday**: 8:00 AM - 9:00 PM
- **Friday - Sunday**: 8:00 AM - 10:00 PM

## Location & Proximity
- Located at I-40 Exit 146 in Ash Fork, Arizona, on historic Route 66
- About 78 miles south of Grand Canyon South Rim (~1 hr 20 min drive)
- 51 miles west of Flagstaff on I-40
- 18 miles from Williams, AZ (gateway to Grand Canyon Railway)
- 97 miles east of Kingman on I-40
- 144 miles north of Phoenix via I-17 and I-40
- 200 miles east of Las Vegas via US-93 and I-40

## Pages
- **Home**: https://spicegrillbar66.com/
- **Near Grand Canyon**: https://spicegrillbar66.com/near-grand-canyon/
- **Directions**: https://spicegrillbar66.com/directions/
- **FAQ**: https://spicegrillbar66.com/faq/

## Full Menu

### Appetizers
- **Chicken Tikka** ($16.99): Chicken marinated in ginger, yogurt & tandoor spices.
- **Chicken Wings (5 pcs)** ($7.99): Buffalo, BBQ, Sweet & Sour.
- **Tandoori Wings (6 pcs)** ($12.99): Made with our special Tandoori spices.
- **Chicken Chilli** ($14.99): Crisp fried chicken with soy-tomato sauce.
- **Chicken Pakora** ($9.99): Spiced & deep fried chicken in chickpea flour.
- **Fish Pakora** ($10.99): Marinated fish fried in our chickpea batter.
- **Veggie Pakora** ($7.99): Mixed vegetable fried in our chickpea batter.
- **Paneer Pakora** ($9.99): Marinated paneer fried in our chickpea batter.
- **Chilli Paneer** ($14.99): Fried paneer cubes tossed in a sweet, spicy, hot, and tangy chili sauce.
- **Samosa (2 pcs)** ($4.99): Indian pastry stuffed with potatoes & peas.
- **Samosa Chaat** ($9.99): Crispy samosa, chickpeas, mint & tamarind sauce.
- **Papdi Chaat** ($7.99): Lightly seasoned flour crisps topped with mint & tamarind chutney, yogurt, onions, and cilantro.
- **Tandoori Chicken (8 pcs)** ($19.99): Chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, cooked in the tandoor.
- **Paneer Tikka** ($16.99): Marinated paneer & veggies cooked in the tandoor.

### Veg Dishes
- **Dal Tadka** ($13.99): Delicious yellow lentil.
- **Dal Makhani** ($14.99): Creamy mixture of assorted lentils.
- **Chana Masala** ($13.99): Chickpeas cooked with herbs and spices.
- **Mix Veg** ($13.99): Mix veggies cooked in curry sauce.
- **Aloo Gobhi** ($13.99): Potatoes & cauliflower in dry curry sauce.
- **Paneer Masala** ($15.99): Cottage cheese & tomatoes in a special cream sauce.
- **Shahi Paneer** ($15.99): Chunks of cottage cheese in a savory rich buttery cream sauce.
- **Saag Paneer** ($14.99): Chunks of cottage cheese mixed in savory spinach sauce.
- **Matar Paneer** ($14.99): Chunks of cottage cheese mixed with green peas.
- **Paneer Bhurji** ($15.99): Scrambled cottage cheese mixed with onions, tomatoes, & herbs.
- **Baingan Bharta** ($13.99): Roasted eggplant seasoned with herbs & spices.
- **Curry Pakora** ($13.99): Deep fried pakoras (fritters) in a tangy yogurt based curry.
- **Rajma** ($14.99): Red kidney beans, spices, onions, tomatoes and herbs.
- **Malai Kofta** ($15.99): Mixed vegetable balls cooked in fresh tomato, onion, and saffron curry sauce.
- **Mushroom Korma** ($15.99): Mushroom in a cream-based curry sauce.
- **Bhendi (Okra)** ($14.99): Okra in a dry curry sauce.

### Non-Veg Dishes
- **Chicken Curry** ($14.99): Chicken cooked in our traditional curry sauce.
- **Chicken Korma** ($15.99): Chicken in a cream-based curry sauce.
- **Chicken Vindaloo** ($14.99): Chicken, and potatoes in a rich gravy sauce.
- **Chicken Saag** ($14.99): Chicken, cooked with freshly chopped spinach.
- **Butter Chicken** ($15.99): Rich butter-cream, tomatoes, onion sauce cooked with chicken thighs.
- **Chicken Tikka Masala** ($15.99): Cooked in a creamy spiced tomato sauce.
- **Karahi Chicken** ($14.99): Chicken sauteed with bell pepper, onions & tomatoes.
- **Goat Curry** ($16.49): Goat cooked in our traditional curry sauce.
- **Goat Korma** ($16.99): Goat in a cream-based curry sauce.
- **Goat Vindaloo** ($16.49): Goat, and potatoes in a rich gravy sauce.
- **Goat Saag** ($16.49): Goat, cooked with freshly chopped spinach.
- **Lamb Curry** ($16.99): Lamb cooked in our traditional curry sauce.
- **Lamb Korma** ($16.99): Lamb in a cream-based curry sauce.
- **Lamb Vindaloo** ($16.99): Lamb and potatoes in a rich gravy sauce.
- **Lamb Saag** ($16.49): Lamb cooked with freshly chopped spinach.

### Rice
- **Plain Rice** ($3.99): Basmati rice with a dash of butter.
- **Jeera Rice** ($8.99): Basmati rice lightly seasoned with cumin.
- **Mushroom Rice** ($9.99): Basmati rice sauteed with Mushrooms.
- **Matar Pulao** ($9.99): Basmati rice seasoned with cumin, peas, and onions.
- **Veg Biryani** ($16.99): Basmati rice sauteed with veggies and spices.
- **Chicken Biryani** ($17.99): Basmati rice sauteed with chicken and spices.
- **Goat Biryani** ($18.99): Basmati rice sauteed with goat and spices.
- **Lamb Biryani** ($18.99): Basmati rice sauteed with lamb and spices.

### Egg Dishes
- **Egg Bhurji** ($14.99): Scrambled eggs with onions, green peppers, chilis and herbs.
- **Egg Curry** ($13.99): Boiled eggs sauteed in onion sauce, green peppers, chilis and herbs.
- **Egg Korma** ($14.99): Boiled eggs sauteed in buttery cream gravy.

### Breads (Roti)
- **Tava Roti** ($1.25)
- **Tandoori Roti** ($1.99)
- **Plain Naan** ($2.99)
- **Butter Naan** ($3.99): Drizzled with butter on top.
- **Garlic Naan** ($3.99): Drizzled with butter and garlic on top.
- **Bullet Naan** ($4.99): Drizzled with green chili, butter and garlic on top.
- **Cheese Naan** ($6.99): Stuffed with cheese and spices. Drizzled with butter on top.
- **Onion Naan** ($4.99): Stuffed with onions and spices. Drizzled with butter on top.
- **Chicken Naan** ($6.99): Stuffed with chicken and spices. Drizzled with butter on top.
- **Methi Naan** ($3.99): Drizzled with butter and methi on top.
- **Peshwari Naan** ($6.99)
- **Paneer Naan** ($6.99): Stuffed with paneer and spices. Drizzled with butter on top.

### Sides
- **Plain Yogurt** ($2.00)
- **Raita (Yogurt)** ($3.00)
- **Mint Chutney (Green Sauce)** ($1.00)
- **Tamarind Chutney (Red Sauce)** ($1.00)
- **Mixed Pickle** ($1.00)

### Desserts
- **Gulab Jamun (2Pcs)** ($2.99): Deep fried dough soaked in cardamom flavored sugar syrup.
- **Kheer (Rice Pudding)** ($4.99): Basmati rice slowly cooked with milk and nuts.
- **Mango Malai** ($7.99): Creamy mango ice cream with shredded mango.
- **Pistachio Ice Cream** ($5.99): Creamy pistachio ice cream.
- **Mango Kulfi** ($5.99): Creamy mango ice cream.
